comment: Solid choice for MKTG 3100. 1 Group Project for the semester. Professor assigns group. Quizzes and non-cummulative exams, no lockdown. Follow the rubric on the group project. Fairly easy grader. Would take again no doubt.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Group projects--Clear grading criteria

comment: Class was pretty straightforward, would have liked more guidance on the project at least in the beginning but she graded fairly. The mid-term and end-term (final) take a hot minute to do and she does grade them a bit more 'strictly' than other coursework so make sure you start them at the beginning of the module and don't procrastinate.
Easiest A ever. She is a super sweet and caring person and even though there is no reason to struggle in her class, she most definitely will help if you are. Very reasonable.
Easy A - 2 short SWOT papers and weekly quizzes. always made an A
